Package external

Class OfflineMapSystem

java.lang.Object
external.OfflineMapSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
MapSystem, java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class OfflineMapSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements MapSystem
An implementation of MapSystem. The Offline map system uses GraphHopper's offline library and OpenStreetMap map data for Scotland. Geocoding (lookup of place names and converting them into coordinates) is not supported, so the whole system works with coordinates only.
